::Vamprah::

Vamprah noticed horrified that her probe was out control and s=
he typed desperatly trying to get the control of it again. When she knew th=
at all her attpems were unsusceesfully she push a red button and the probe =
exploted.

"Now, I'm in jaws" Vamprah though. 

A big Shadow moved behind h=
er she spun her chair and saw at her huge creation. The male bot emited a s=
ort of roar, Vamprah smiled and said "Are you thirsy my dear? Don't worry, =
soon you will drink all Metal fluid that you wish"
